data.text:
@TheNextTrainIs As an example of a possible transit exposure, I took a 555 ride on Sat where I noticed the person across me had their nose sticking out above their mask.

Tried to go down to lower deck, only to find 2 unmasked riders there (which is probably why everyone went to upper deck).

@TheNextTrainIs Between the Jollibee (which was 5d before my symptoms appeared), exposure while on transit, and a few other places that have remained on mind, I have not been able to rule out any of them. (Explanation in next tweet)
@daka_x Wishing you a swift recovery! :( this sucks. Glad you have remained so vigilant though
@daka_x Make sure you speakout on March 24,2022 TransLink Board.
@daka_x I bet a lot more ppl get infected from riding public transit. But it prob gets counted as "unknown" in BC.
@daka_x Hope you have a speedy recovery!
